original_text: Hegai liked Esther and he was kind to her. As soon as Esther arrived, Hegai gave her special food and oils to make her more beautiful. He chose seven female servants from the king's palace to take care of her. Then he moved Esther and her servants to the best rooms in the harem.
korean_text: 헤개가 이 처녀를 좋게 보고 은혜를 베풀어 몸을 정결하게 할 물품과 일용품을 곧 주며 또 왕궁에서 으레 주는 일곱 궁녀를 주고 에스더와 그 궁녀들을 후궁 아름다운 처소로 옮기더라

sentences.original_text: and he was kind to her
and oils to make her more beautiful
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀를 더 아름답게 만들 기름을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he moved Esther and her servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그는 에스더와 그녀의 종들을 옮겼습니다

sentences.original_text: to the best rooms in the harem
